title: Should I Dump My Friend?
description:
Linda has lost all respect for her friend of 35 years, but is afraid of letting her know that she's ready to end their relationship. - Dr. Laura: "Be courageous and do what needs to be done."

Have you ever held onto a friendship that you should have walked away from? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura

Instagram.com/DrLauraProgram
